NK040(thi)006:1: // mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i mngon rtogs las byung ba'i gnas dang yo byad byin brlab ni /
NK040(thi)006:2: badz+ra a mri ta swa b+ha wa sogs /
NK040(thi)006:4: stong pa'i ngang las lha rdzas las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang gi phyi nang kun tu /
NK040(thi)006:5: a las ye shes kyi ka p+aa la yangs shing
NK040(thi)006:6: rgya che ba'i nang du +aahmh'uh'oda du zhu ba las
NK040(thi)006:14: rol mo'i sgra la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
NK040(thi)006:15: kun tu bzang po'i rnam par thar pa las byung
NK040(thi)006:16: ba'i mchod sprin bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur /
NK040(thi)006:17: ma h+aa gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ni ar+g+ham pra tits+tsha ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)006:21: shap+da pra tits+tsha ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK040(thi)006:22: bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro sprin gtibs pa ltar byon nas byin gyis brlabs par mos la /
NK040(thi)006:28: pra dz+ny+aa pa ra mi ta /
NK040(thi)006:31: san+to sha no h'u h'u h'u /
